text: Aldo Curti (born March 12, 1926) is a retired Italian professional football player. He played one game in the Serie A, for A.S. Roma in the 1947/48 season. ==External links== *Profile at Enciclopediadelcalcio.it Category:1926 births Category:Living people Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie A players Category:Montevarchi Calcio Aquila 1902 players Category:A.S. Roma players Category:Parma Calcio 1913 players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Sportspeople from Arezzo
title: Aldo Curti
